overview:
Current General Counsel and VP of Business Development for Tagged.com (www.tagged.com), the third largest social networking website with over 20 million monthly unique visitors.

Co-Founder and former General Counsel/COO of Ennovate Media (www.ennovatemedia.com), a rapidly growing online advertising company that has developed and maintained a unique technological edge within the industry.

Former Vice President of Business and Legal Affairs for The Deal, L.L.C., publisher of The Deal, The Daily Deal and Corporate Control Alert, providing general legal counsel and advice concerning all company matters, including corporate, finance, real estate, litigation, intellectual property, licensing, libel and employment issues. Also responsible for negotiating, structuring and drafting the company’s internet, new media, technology, license, joint venture, employment and service agreements and helped manage the company’s business development and strategy including strategic alliances, joint ventures and acquisitions.

Former Corporate Associate with Dewey Ballantine LLP.

Columbia Law School graduate with significant experience in general corporate, M&A and securities transactions.

relationships.title: VP of Business Development and General Counsel
